import emailjs from "emailjs-com"; import React from "react"; import "./Contact.css"; import contactimage from "./Contact-Us.png"; const Contact = () => { function sendEmail(e) { e.prevntDefault(); emailjs .sendForm( "service_79gwlzl", "template_unz0f8i", e.target, "UcLDfkS0EI_vDbf3Z" ) .then((res) => { console.log(res); }) .catch((err) => console.log(err)); } return (

Contact me

+007 9089 6767
abc@gmail.com
Faridabad, Haryana
); }; export default Contact;
